name: Ninetales

passive.name: Quickfire
passive.effect: When your Pokemon retreats, if it has a Fire Energy attached, its retreat cost is 1 less.

attacks.name: Flare Up
attacks.effect: You may attach up to 2 Fire Energies from your discard pile to Ninetales.

attacks.name: Overheat
attacks.effect: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Ninetales.

flavor: Ninetales are wicked foxes known for their agility and trickery.
